alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:44PM MDT until November 02 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Peola, Craigmont, Mountain Road, Winchester, Anatone, Cloverland Road, and Soldiers Meadow Road. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
